learn:
The name should probably include the band’s name, the release title, and format. What you put in here is what the public will see.

In the item’s description make sure and note important things like limited edition, colored vinyl, t-shirt manufacturer, unreleased songs, etc. Let me know why they should buy it.

Note that if you leave the quantity as -1 then it it will be considered unlimited. So if this is a physical item make sure and put in the correct quantity or you’ll have some unhappy customers when you sell out.

Clicking the enable “pay-at-least” minimum pricing box lets your fans pay more than the price that you’ve set for the item if they want to.

copy.reset_variants: Need a new set of variants? Reset all variant options and quantities here.
copy.variations: Does your item come in mulitple sizes, colors or other formats? Add those variations here.
copy.no_regions: Please set shipping regions before setting shipping prices:
copy.find_orders: Find all orders for this item
